translations: 迷人的；可爱的；引人注目的

sentences.sentence: She gave him her best winsome smile.
sentences.translation: 她给了他一个最迷人的微笑。

sentences.sentence: You win some… and you winsome more.
sentences.translation: 你赢得了一些，然后你赢得了更多。

sentences.sentence: Two winsome women, will be very happy today, so do I.
sentences.translation: 两个魅力四射的女人，今天将是很幸福，我也是。
